SCOPE OF JOBAKI SERVICES 1.1 Jobaki provides the Jobaki Platform to enable Posters to publish Posted Tasks. Some parts of Offer details may be made publicly available, including to internet users who are not Users. 1.3 A Poster may revoke or modify a Posted Task at any time before he she accepts an Offer. Jobaki reserves the right to cancel all Offers on a Posted Task made prior to the modification. 1.4 If a Poster accepts an Offer on the Jobaki Platform, a Task Contract is created between the Jobaki and the Poster. 1.5 Upon creation of a Task Contract, the Poster must pay the Agreed Price into the Payment Account. 1.6 Upon creation of the Task Contract, Jobaki has rendered Jobaki Services and the Service Fee is due and payable. 1.7 Once the Task Contract is created, the Jobaki and Poster may vary the Task Contract on the Jobaki Platform. The Poster and Jobaki are encouraged to use Jobaki s private messaging system to amend or vary the Task Contract including the Agreed Price or to otherwise communicate. 1.8 Once the Services are complete, the Jobaki must provide notice of that on the Jobaki Platform. 1.9 Once the Services are complete, the Poster must provide notice of that on the Jobaki Platform. 1.10 Once the Posted Task has been completed and the Poster confirms the Services are completed, or if Jobaki is satisfied the Services have been completed, the Jobaki Funds will be released by Jobaki from the Payment Account to the Jobaki . However this process does not apply to the payment of Recurring Services which is addressed in clause 1.16 below. 1.11 After the Task Contract is completed, the parties are encouraged to review and provide feedback of the Services on the Jobaki Platform. 1.12 Jobaki may also provide a Search Assist feature enabling Posters to submit an Offer for Services. 1.13 An Offer submitted by a Poster using Search Assist may be notified to other Users and such Users may elect to make an Instant Claim of it. 1.14 When using Search Assist a Task Contract is created when a Jobaki makes an Instant Claim and in the case of Recurring Services a Task Contract is created for the first Occurrence only . For Recurring Services, the next Task Contract is created upon completion of the previous Occurrence. 1.15 A Poster may revoke or modify its Offer in using Search Assist, including for Recurring Services, at any time before a Jobaki makes an Instant Claim. Jobaki reserves the right to cancel all Posted Tasks made prior to the revocation or modification. 1.16 For Recurring Services and subject to clause 1.17, once the Occurrence has been completed and the Jobaki confirms the Occurrence is completed or if Jobaki is satisfied the Occurrence is completed then the Jobaki Funds for that Occurrence will automatically be released by Jobaki from the Payment Account to the Jobaki . 1.17 The Poster may elect to pause automatic payment of Jobaki Funds for an Occurrence within 24 hours from when the Jobaki confirms the Occurrence is completed. If the Poster pauses such automatic payment in accordance with this clause, then the Jobaki Funds will not be released by Jobaki from the Payment Account to the Jobaki until the Poster also confirms that the Occurrence is completed.
